title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Bravado Hotring Hellfire
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the new Bravado Hotring Hellfire sports car as part of the latest round of Member benefits through October 11.

The Bravado Hotring Hellfire (Sports) puts the capital “H” in horsepower with its turbo-charged engines designed to test the mettle of even the most seasoned adrenaline-junkies.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
